names.pharmaceuticalLatin: Semen Sojae Germinatum Semen Glycines Germinatum

action.primary: Releases the Exterior and clears Damp-Heat

indications: Edema and warm-damp disease with sweating

action.primary: Invigorates Qi and Blood and reduces water distention

indications: Damp-Heat Bi with cramping of the sinews and knee pain

action.primary: Raises Yang Qi and opens the channels and collaterals

useCases: Body aches, loose stools and epigastric distention due to Exterior Dampness in the channels with Dampness in the Middle Jiao.

notes: This is the dried emerging sprout of the black soybean.
This herb is able to unblock Blood Stasis in the channels when treating Damp Bi with cramping, spasms or edema with a full sensation in the abdomen.
Clear Water Bean Curls Qing Shui Dou Juan (the water used for sprouting) is best for cooling and clearing Damp-Heat
Large Yellow Bean Curls Da Huang Dou Juan has been decocted with Rx. Ephedrae Ma Huang and is warming with a stronger tendency to induce sweating and release the Exterior.
